code: import i18n from"i18next";import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import translationEN from'./en/translationEN.json';import translationES from'./es/translationES.json';import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";var resources={en:{translation:translationEN},es:{translation:translationES}};export default i18n.use(initReactI18next).use(LanguageDetector).init({resources:resources,supportedLngs:['en','es'],fallbackLng:'en',keySeperator:false,interpolation:{escapeValue:false},detection:{order:['cookie','localStorage'],caches:['cookie']}});
